website_summaries.verdict: These tabbed adult diapers are economically priced, which is good for those who need to shop in bulk.
pros: Very similar in performance and design to disposable briefs used in nursing homes and hospitals
Raised fluted edges contain urinary and fecal leaks
Easy to use on bedridden patients
cons: Proper sizing can be an issue, as they tend to run small
Described as a brief, but fits more like an adult diaper

customer_reviews.title: great fit . quiet. and easy to get fitted right.
customer_reviews.text: Great fit. Absorbant. I am very active the tabs hold up great. Not a night time diaper unless adding a diaper is doubled or using a insert. Discreet fit. Would get five stars if it was a little more absorbent. Holds a heavy wetting pretty well. Have had no leaks will sag if too wet do to cloth backing but it has the best fit of all diapers I have worn. Know one will know you are wearing these if you keep changed .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I know there are all kinds of people that like this new pseudocloth stuff and these freaky tabs
customer_reviews.text: This product is substandard. I know there are all kinds of people that like this new pseudocloth stuff and these freaky tabs, but I am not one of them. In addition to non-absorbency, they are prone to leaks. I am sending mine back, and I hate doing that.
customer_reviews.author: Mountain Hick

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: exactly what i was looking for can't buy over the counter thank you Medline/Amazon
customer_reviews.author: Drack

customer_reviews.title: They have been the perfect fit and brief for my bedridden husband
customer_reviews.text: I order these briefs and they arrived in two days. They have been the perfect fit and brief for my bedridden husband!
customer_reviews.author: jodee

customer_reviews.title: Fits great. My 13 year old son with special needs ...
customer_reviews.text: Fits great . My 13 year old son with special needs is incontinent . No leaking .
customer_reviews.author: olivia l.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These are the best adult briefs I have found to use for my family member's incontinence needs.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: and so easy to have shipped as caregiver - can't beat the ...
customer_reviews.text: cost effective, yet durable and leak resistant. and so easy to have shipped as caregiver - can't beat the convenience.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Cline

customer_reviews.title: mom likes these
customer_reviews.text: I buy these for my mom and she likes them just fine.
customer_reviews.author: L. Brown

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Thanks for getting me the best price on a much needed item.
customer_reviews.author: Rosemary L. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product for Price!
customer_reviews.text: Tried this as more economical option to Prevail Max Absorbancy briefs/diapers. Slightly thinner but works well and has raised, fluted edging to contain leaks, a feature usually only available in expensive products for urinary and fecal incontinence. Will continue to use for bedridden mom during the day when changes are more frequent. May be ok overnight if not heavy wetter. Very pleased with performance considering substantial price savings.
customer_reviews.author: Portland, Oregon

customer_reviews.title: Decent quality, amazing value.
customer_reviews.text: They can hold a completely full bladder's worth, maybe two, and snugly fit around the thighs and groin to prevent leaking during urination. However, if left for an extended period while sitting or laying in full ones, the pressure will naturally cause leakage to occur. Pairing with plastic pants/panties will prevent that.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Lluvias

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: This didn't work out for my husband's problem. I gave them to charity.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is the cheapest way to go and they are very absorbent.
customer_reviews.author: payat

customer_reviews.title: Pricing good, not pleased with fit
customer_reviews.text: Not as happy with this product as previously used Depend product. Medline price better than Depend, but product doesn't fit as well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Glad you offer this product in the right quantities. The best pricing.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen L. Grimes

customer_reviews.title: After our love one left hospice care
customer_reviews.text: This product was introduced to us by a local hospice over a 2 years period. After our love one left hospice care, we tried to purchases all the products that they used in her care, this product being one of them. If it good enough for hospice than it good enough for us was out thinking at the time. We are able to purchases every item in one location at present which is another plus.
customer_reviews.author: Carmen Haynes

customer_reviews.title: Review order statuse! !
customer_reviews.text: I would like to stop this item for the month of February 2019 I will reorder when I need it again> thank you Ralph McKune
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They fit as name implies
customer_reviews.text: These do fit as described, wore these several hours they felt not different then normal underwear, fit comfortably, they at least for urine eliminated the odor until I removed them. Its interesting to find inner leg gathers in a cloth - like adult brief. The tabs hold snug but are easily refasten able for making for a more snug fit if it loosens. not sure how it deals with bowel episodes as I didn't have one at the time I am writing this. Also not a problem but is interesting that the inner leg gathers stick together. I found the bag marked down at good will, definitely worth their asking price.
customer_reviews.author: dave82

customer_reviews.title: Poorly made
customer_reviews.text: Side tape all fell apart. Therefore, unable to stay on. Poorly made. Money wasted.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pathetic
customer_reviews.text: Horrible. The depends adjustable are no longer available. For some stupid reason they discontinued the product. There is no product out there to replace them. Tried them all.
customer_reviews.author: james

customer_reviews.title: the medium does not fit the sizes it indicates on ...
customer_reviews.text: the medium does not fit the sizes it indicates on the package. If you order a size bigger they may be alright
customer_reviews.author: Nannette

product_meta.title: FitRight Plus Adult Diapers, Disposable Incontinence Briefs with Tabs, Moderate Absorbency, Medium, 32"-42", 4 packs of 20 (80 total)
product_meta.description:
Size:MediumFitRight Plus Adult Diapers with tabs are made to protect against wetness while enhancing patient dignity and skin health. The less bulky, patented 4D-Core locks in moisture away from skin to help prevent discomfort and skin damage. Soft, cloth-like material adds extra comfort and skin-protecting moisture control. These adult incontinence diapers are easy to wear, provide a better fit and offer exceptional odor control for discreet protection. FitRight products are made here in the US.

MANUFACTURER CONTACT INFORMATION
18006335463
feature_bullets: FitRight Plus Adult Diapers promote a better fit as well as comfort and dignity, while soft anti-leak guards reduce leakage and improve containment
These incontinence diapers for adults feature a 4D-Core with odor protection that wicks fluid away to promote dryness and help maintain skin integrity
Unlike incontinence underwear, adult briefs with tabs have skin-safe closures that provide secure, safe and repeated refastenability
Ultra-soft cloth-like back sheet provides a discreet, garment-like, natural feel | Moisture alert wetness indicator changes color when adult diaper has been soiled
These adult diapers for men or women fit waists 32 to 42 inches and have a moderate absorbency | Brief size: Medium
